article_title: What's The ROI Of A Smartphone Given To Patients With A Chronic Health Condition?

article_metadata.author: Dan Munro

og.description: Thanks to a pilot project announced today by Microsoft, TracFone and Health Choice Network (here) we're about to find out. Set to launch in January, the pilot project is designed to test the theory that smartphones can lower costs and manage chronic conditions like diabetes with better health outcomes. One big [...]
